name: Craft Essence Hot Pants - Women's
description:
Maybe you don’t like long shorts, or you like to let your legs breathe, either way these minimal shorts have you covered. From weekend tours, to club rides, to your daily commute, these minimalist cycling shorts use recycled material to keep you comfy during long hours in the saddle. Designed for a women’s body, the Essence Hot Pants keep it simple, so nothing distracts you from your ride.Lycra® Sport Energy compression fabric reduces muscle fatigue.Recycled nylon blend has a supple 4-way stretch.Infinity C3 chamois with high-density foam provides comfort on longer rides.Silicone leg grippers hold hems in place.Reflective detailing for visibility on low-light rides.Shaped waist for enhanced comfort and coverage in the drop.

        Sustainability
